letters:
I want to take a moment to express how truly sorry I am for my actions. It pains me to think that I have hurt you, and I deeply regret allowing myself to flirt with someone else. I never intended to undermine the trust and love we have built together, and I want you to know that this was a moment of weakness that I wholeheartedly regret.

You mean the world to me, and I realize now how thoughtless my actions were, not just toward you but toward what we share. I love the connection we have, and the joy you bring into my life is irreplaceable. I never want to jeopardize that again.

I understand if you need space to process your feelings, but I hope we can talk soon. I want to be honest about everything and make things right between us. You deserve openness and respect, and I am committed to showing you that I can do better. 

Thank you for your understanding and for everything you bring to my life. I am fully prepared to work through this and rebuild the trust that has been shaken. I love you deeply and hope we can find a way to move forward together. 

With all my love and sincerity,
[Your Name]
